name: Orion (Kingsoft)
overview: A difficult avoid it style game with good music. With your spaceship you have got into the star system of Orion, in which you have now been held captive. In order to escape from the star system again, you have to collect a total of 18 energy bundles in the star system. An exciting action game with a lot of variety. You have been trapped in the solar system "Orion" with your space ship. To escape from there you have to find and collect 18 energy pills. A thrilling action game with plenty of variety.
